Articles.Content:
I think it is possible to create KSP Career/Sandbox multiplayer. What are you thinking about?

P.S. I'm sorry for my bad english.

Squad has already stated that they will not be adding multiplayer anytime soon, and although the modding community has demonstrated that it is indeed possible with working examples it is not likely to become a game feature anytime soon.

I'm going to lock this simply because we've had a million multiplayer discussions and the first six pages will just be people linking you to a recent mod that makes it possible, but if you're interested in the mod at all, check out the KMP Plugin thread.
